examples.example: 他绝对不是故意冒犯你的，可能是无心之失。

translate.english: He is definitely not intentionally offending you, maybe it is an inadvertent mistake.

examples.example: 他故意制造惊喜，让大家都非常开心。

translate.english: He deliberately created surprises, making everyone very happy.

examples.example: 他故意放慢脚步，只为能和我多聊一会儿。

translate.english: He deliberately slowed down his pace just to be able to chat with me a little longer.
